title: cmd/present: navigational help text is distracting when writing slides
body:
I'm writing some slides right now and the help text is driving me bonkers. It is a distraction every time I switch from editor to browser and reload, particularly when it covers text and/or the Run button.

Can we do one of these:

* Disable it when on localhost/127.0.0.1
* Use local storage and/or cookies to only display it once per browser
* Accept a flag to present to disable it (which would have to be passed on to the javascript somehow)

// cc @adg
